email.resetPasswordBody:
Reset Your Crims City Password

Hello! Did you forget the key to your virtual office in Crims City? Don't worry, you can easily reset your password using this link:

Reset Password

After clicking the link, you will be redirected to a page where you can set a new password.

Remember to use a strong and unique password to protect your account.
email.activationEmailMessage:
Unlock the gates of Crims City and dive into underground adventures, activate your account now!

Click here to activate your account.

LOGIN.ACCOUNT_ACTIVATE_FALSE: Account not activated, check your email.
LOGIN.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password does not meet the requirements: minimum 6 characters, 1 uppercase letter, 1 digit, 1 special character.
LOGIN.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: An internal server error occurred. Contact the Administrator.
LOGIN.USER_NOT_FOUND: No user found with this email address.
LOGIN.EMAIL_WITH_RESET: An email with a password reset link has been sent.
LOGIN.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 6 characters long, include 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase letter, 1 digit, and 1 special character.
LOGIN.CONTACT_SUCCESS: Thank you for your message, we will reply as soon as possible.
LOGIN.CONTACT_NO_SUCCESS: An unexpected error occurred, contact support@crims-city.ct8.pl.
